roleset_name: cause something to have an infection, causing to become infected, have an infection

roles.descr: causer of infection, but not germ
roles.descr_trans: 感染的原因，但不是细菌

roles.descr: more specific body part becoming infected, if in addition to ARG1
roles.descr_trans: 如果除了 ARG1 之外，更具体的身体部位也会被感染

roleset_name_trans: 导致某物感染，导致被感染，感染
